title: Biden holding Cyber Monday meeting with retail CEOs to discuss inflation, supply chains
text:
The meeting will be held virtually and in person and attended by Best Buy Co. Inc. BBY CEO Corie Barry, Samsung KR:005930 CEO KS Choi, Walmart Inc. WMT CEO Dough McMillion, CVS Health Corp. CVS chief Karen Lynch, as well as the top executives at Kroger Co. KR, Mattel Inc. MAT, Qurate Retail Inc. QRTEA, Todos Supermarket and Food Lion.

Following the meeting the president will deliver remarks on his administrations' efforts to improve supply chains and combat inflation.
